an absolute masterclass in atmosphere and environmental storytelling. it's not as long as many other games, or even it's sequel, but it uses the time it has very well. everything from the level design to the dialogue and music and ambience is perfectly crafted to convey the loneliness and dread of being trapped in a long-abandoned science facility with no one but a glitchy AI and a bunch of murderous turrets, while also having some humor to lighten the mood and keep things from feeling too hopeless.

overall, a very good game. probably one of the best. play it.
This mechanic is just so good, also the way for implementing it, the last song is a masterpiece. In summary a really good game

Świetna gra logiczna, momentami trochę zręcznościowa. Przyznaję się, że za pierwszym uruchomieniem nie skumałem o co w niech chodzi i wyłączyłem na długi czas. Ostatnio polecił ją jeden ze znajomych i postanowiłem odpalić by spróbować się przekonać z czym to się je. No i pozostaje tylko napisać - Wspaniała. No i raz, że skończyło się to tortem a i właśnie zainstalowałem Portala 2 :) Polecam. Dzięki @WulgarnyGracz

" When the test course is over, you will be missed. " 

Portal é um jogo dinâmico que mistura um divertido percurso labiríntico e um enredo envolvente que aos poucos se revela. Seu humor sarcástico é representado principalmente pela principal personagem com quem interagimos, a infame e companheira IA GLaDOS, que rouba a cena com seus comentários habilidosamente tecidos. Ao longo da curta (a depender das sacadas do jogador diante dos puzzles) jornada, a história criada em segundo plano toma conta dos momentos da jogatina, criando brechas para que conheçamos o universo interessantemente proposto, fazendo parte, inclusive, de uma longa teia relacionada à sua sequência, jogos "primos" (como o famigerado Half Life) e HQ's, sem falar nos desafios que, como conteúdo extra, mobilizam os mais corajosos e estendem a experiência. Como um excelente passatempo e uma grande fomenta à imaginação, criatividade e curiosidade, Portal é um fenômeno que vale a pena conferir e apreciar. 

" The cake is a [CENSORED] "

Totalnie polecam. Przyjemna rozgrywka, tania cena w porównaniu do jakości które jest na wysokim poziomie. Pójdzie na większości komputerów i nie waży dużo. Serdecznie polecam bo jak tu nie znać takich klasyków... Szczególnie po tylu latach :0
:D

I wasn't really interested in Portal since I don't really play puzzle games. But huge Steam sale convinced me and I don't regret it! This is more than just a fun puzzle game with portal-mechanics. It has interesting lore behind it. If only it was longer than 2.5 hrs. Well...on to the next one!

11/10 must buy, especially in sale

PS: First game where I didn't skip ending credits. So cool.
PPS: Remember: Cake is a LIE!

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
I LIKE THE GAME
